name: Spinach Omelet
shortSteps: Whisk eggs with a splash of milk.
Pour eggs, fold with cheese, and cook until set.

name: Creamy Pasta Bake
shortSteps: Mix cooked pasta with chopped leftovers and milk.
Top with cheese and bake until golden.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
shortSteps: Heat oil in a pan and add sliced vegetables.
Cook on high heat with soy sauce for 6-8 minutes.

name: Chicken Lettuce Wraps
shortSteps: Cook minced chicken with chopped onion and carrot.
Season and spoon into lettuce leaves.

name: Berry Yogurt Parfait
shortSteps: Layer yogurt, berries, and oats in a glass.

name: Leftover Rice Frittata
shortSteps: Mix leftovers with eggs and chopped spinach.
Cook in skillet and finish under broiler with cheese.
